title: A Marriage of Many Interests
description: When young and beautiful Mara is offered to marry a high-ranking officer of the Empire, it is considered an excellent match for her wealthy family. However, she does not yet know that General Xander Valentine is a ruthless warrior, famous for having destroyed entire planets. Reluctantly, she puts her own dreams to the side to take her place in society. But Mara's marriage does not turn out to be anything like what she had been led to believe. Valentine is cold, distant, and with time she realizes that he is hiding a secret large enough to rip their lives apart, a secret even more dangerous than the countless war crimes he perpetrated during his career. And it has something to do with the presence of Sir Edan Brenlin, which she is expected to accept without question. Who is that mysterious brooding knight, really?  This complicated love story between a closeted man and his young wife, set a long time ago in a galaxy far, far away, is followed by a free ‘what if’ short story.  **Dark Erotic Romance, bittersweet HEA. M/F. M/M.
author: Dina Thala
